text: Hey! :wave: Has anyone already worked on a social media aggregator feed widget for HubSpot CMS? Didn't find anything in the code gallery nor the marketplace... That is the kind of module that I think would be very nice to find as an open source item and would benefit our community since a lot of HS customers want a feed on their website. If someone has started working on something I will be glad to help and contribute. Best,
<@U22PKFRU5> this is a perfect candidate for you know what
<@U7SL518D6> Do I need to be worried?
lol no, it’s a positive thing
Hey <@UGULQ6P6D> I recently became aware of this repo <https://github.com/jpetrucciani/HubSpot3> that might be a little more actively maintained than hapipy. Hope this helps
